column1: #Text=A polycrystalline sample REE*MxMn1-xO3 were prepared by using conventional solid-state reaction method starting from REE2(C2O4)3, xH2O obtained from the waste and Mn(C2O4)3.H2O.
#Text=The precursors were mixed in stoichiometric proportions and grinded for 30 min.
#Text=The obtained powder was then annealed at 800 °C in air for 12 h and pressed into pellets of 15 mm diameter and 2 mm thickness.
#Text=The pellets were sintered at 900 °C and 1000 °C for 24 h with intermediate grinding and pelleting processes.
#Text=The final annealing temperature was 1100 °C for 24 h.
